price: 50. Qamiisyadoodu ka sameysan yihiin daamur (Naar ah), waxaana dabooli wajiyadooda dab.
arabic: سَرَابِيلُهُم مِّن قَطِرَانٖ وَتَغۡشَىٰ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: sarābīluhum min qaṭirānin wataghshā wujūhahumu al-nāru
